item.title: Places to get One Last Song
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: One Last Song #1 (FEB073275) will be coming out in April, obviously you should support your local comic book shop and pre-order it there, but there's a chance your LCS might not get it. Here's a list of places online for you to pre-order it: Things From Another World Mile High Comics Iron Fortress Games NekoSphere Comics Discount Comic Book Service
